Text: any chance we can get a full seed? i dont mind leaving it up, its small, just gotta have it first. *grin*

FUCKING SHIT, WOT A WAST OF TIME
There are, maybe, 3 good templates in this download. The rest are pretty aweful.

As a designer for many years, I though this would be a great start for some friends who are just getting into using CSS - However, after I actually looked at them, not only do the promote shitty CSS naming conventions (and all around usage), they layouts are horrible and the color schemes are well below par.  If these truly are the top 100 CSS websites then the designing world is in serious trouble...

My recommendation:  Forget this, don't seed it, don't download it.

@solidfan

- Seriously?  I mean really... these are templates, if you use these as live sites as they are, you deserve to have the shitty sponsored links at the bottom.  After all, who would ever think that when they are editing the content, to actually remove the footer information and replace it with their own.
